He has special expertise in 11 areas: Cryosurgery Kidney Cancer Kidney Cancer (Renal Cell Carcinoma) Laproscopic Surgery (Laparoscopy) Lymph Node Excision (Lymph node removal) Nephrectomy (Kidney Removal) Overactive Urinary Bladder Prostate Cancer (Prostatic Neoplasm) Prostate Surgery (Prostatectomy) Testis Cancer (Testicular Neoplasm) Urinary Bladder Cancer (Transitional Cell Carcinoma)
